noFeatures.title: No Features
noFeatures.message: There are no features configured. Please speak to your system administrator for more information.

companyFeatures.title: Feature Management
companyFeatures.informationText:
Feature Management allows a super admin to override which features are enabled at an enterprise level.

The value in brackets shows the global default state for any feature if no override exists - this can be overridden for the enterprise with the "Enabled" and "Disabled" radio buttons. Finally, an override can be removed by clicking "Clear".

(Note that if no override exists, neither radio button will be selected.)
